posts.title: Why the WHO Recomends Meditation as a Powerful Tool for  Health
posts.author: Global Insight News
posts.content: The World Health Organization (WHO) recognizes meditation as a powerful way to boost mental and physical health. It helps reduce stress, anxiety, and depression while promoting emotional balance and clarity.Meditation also improves physical health by lowering blood pressure, strengthening immunity, improving sleep, and supporting heart health. Thatâ€™s why WHO includes it in its mental wellness strategies.In todayâ€™s busy world, meditation is more than a spiritual practiceâ€”itâ€™s a science-backed tool for better living. Just a few minutes a day can make a big difference. Start todayâ€”your mind and body will thank you.

posts.title: Big Blow to Kenyans as VAT increases to 20%
posts.author: Global Insights News
posts.content:
Kenyans are facing a fresh financial hit after the government raised VAT from 16% to 20% in the 2025 Finance Bill. The hike means higher prices for basic goods and services, deepening the cost of living crisis for many households.

Small businesses fear reduced sales, while citizens worry about tighter budgets. The government says the move is needed to boost revenue, but critics argue it will hurt ordinary Kenyans the most.
